>

 

Hi Indiegogo! We are a small team from Sweden that loves to push buttons. We invented the Smart Button in 2013 and launched it right here on Indiegogo in 2014. Thanks to our amazing community, we have run two successful crowdfunding campaigns before and delivered on both of them.
column3:
>

 

Today, we are very excited to show you what we have been up to for the last three years. Indiegogo - welcome Flic 2 and the Flic Hub LR! 

Flic is a small push button. In the Flic App, you choose what you want to happen when you push, push twice, or hold it down.
column4:
>

You don't need to talk to Flic. You don't need to unlock your phone or trust that an AI will figure you out. You just have to push a button.
column5:
>

 

We’ve taken everything we’ve learned from making smart buttons for over six years, we’ve listened to feedback from the community and revisited every single detail to come up with a product that we sincerely believe is the perfect button.
column6:
>

 

The Flic Hub is an optional accessory to Flic so you don't have to connect the buttons to your phone. It has also been rebuilt from the ground up to optimize performance, to add HomeKit capability, and to add Bluetooth Long Range.
column8:
>

The most common ways our community use Flic are to toggle lights and control music. But people are really creative, there are literally thousands of wildly different things that people use Flic shortcuts for!
column9:
>

 

We all have different routines. What we do when we wake up in the morning, how we get to work, and how we structure our day. Flic is a tool that helps you simplify your everyday routines. Instead of different apps or complicated voice commands, structure your life with buttons!
column10:
>

 

A push-of-a-button life doesn’t have to be complicated. Quite the opposite! Reduce the clutter with technology that just works.

column3:
>

 

There are a large number of integrations already in the Flic App and ready to use! Through third-party services such as IFTTT, Zapier, and Microsoft Flow, practically anything is possible. And if you're an advanced tech user, with our versatile HTTP Request function you can write your own commands in the Flic App.
column5:
>

 

Everyone knows how to push a button. We have seen applications for kids, for people with disabilities, for visually impaired, and even for dogs! After 5 years we still see and hear about new amazing things that people do using Flic buttons. Here are just a few things that our community has shared with us:
column7:
>

 Flic 2 opens up new opportunities that were not possible before while maintaining the world-class simplicity, stability, and security that Flic has been known for.
column8:
>

 

The easiest way to set Flic 2 up is with the free Flic App. The most common Flic features are already available there. Here is how the new 2-step pairing with the App works:

column3: >The Flic App is already available. Select what you want to happen for each push, double push, and hold. You can even sequence actions, so that multiple things happen when toy push twice, for example.
column5:
>

 

The micro-suction adhesive is included with every Flic 2. The suction adhesive allows you to attach Flic to any surface. Micro-suction means it contains hundreds of tiny suction cups that don’t leave any residue! The suction pad is easy to clean with water and can be reused many times. 

Yep, Maria throws it up on the roof in the last scene - it sticks there like a magnet!
column6:
>

 

Flic 2 is built for accessories. New label stickers make it easy for you and your guests to understand what each button does.
column8:
>

 

The new rigid multi-purpose metal clip makes Flic easy to attach to keys, clothes, bags, and much more.
column10:
>

 

Flic 2 can give you visual feedback in three colors: green, yellow, and red. Just like traffic lights! It can blink green if your action was successful, yellow while you’re waiting (not applicable for most uses), and red if there is something wrong.
column13:
>

 

 

With Flic 2, you can access any other app that is open for Flic, and developers can build apps for the entire Flic 2 community. This opens up for A LOT more things you can use Flic for! If you develop a use case for Flic 2, it will immediately be made available to the broader Flic audience.
column14:
>

 

This is something we are extra proud of - Flic 2 can toggle multiple apps at the same time! You can push to turn on the Lights in your lights app and push twice to snooze the alarm-app!
column16:
>

 

Flic 2 can switch mode between being a smart Flic button, a Bluetooth Keyboard/mouse, or a Low latency MIDI controller.
column17:
>

With Flic 2, there are many ways to be truly creative. If you’re a musician for example, it can be configured to imitate a wireless amplifier switch.
column19:
>


Compared to the original Flic, this button is infinitely more flexible and open. There is no longer a requirement to use the Flic App or the Flic Hub or even to have an internet connection when you set it up. As an example, you can implement our open Flic 2 connection protocol in your Arduino robot, or use our free SDKs for iOS, Android, Linux, or OSX, and many more, without making any stability or security compromises. Read more under For Developers.
column20:
>

Every Flic button needs to be connected to something. The common ways are to a phone, a laptop, or a Flic Hub. 

The benefits of using a Flic Hub is that your Flic buttons don't need your phone to be around in order to work. So in your home or in your office, you can put up buttons that everyone can use even when you are not around. 

One Flic Hub can be connected to 63 Flic buttons at the same time, while a phone can connect to 6-8 Flics depending on the type of phone.

Flic Hub LR (Long Range) has been rebuilt from the ground up, for optimized performance and double range. It has the same discreet and award-winning design as the original Flic Hub, and it packs a lot more power.
column21:
>

 

We are working together with Apple to add HomeKit support to the Flic Hub LR. This means that all your Flic buttons (including original Flics!) that are connected to a Flic Hub LR can be configured in the Apple Home App. So all your buttons will be able to control everything in your Apple Home ecosystem!
column22:
>

Since this is a lot of work, we won’t have this in place when we ship the Flic Hub LRs in September, but it will be released as a software update this fall.
column23:
>

 

The IR (Infrared) accessory to the Flic Hub allows you to control things that you otherwise would need a remote control for.  Control your TV, Home Entertainment systems, A/C, to name a few. 

The IR Accessory is the same that was available before. However, due to hardware improvements in the Flic Hub LR, the precision of the IR learning and blasting makes it possible to use for even more devices.

column1: Flic 2 and Flic Hub LR both have Bluetooth 5.0 Long Range capability, which means that they can stay connected to each other over larger distances. The range of Bluetooth Long Range can be compared to WiFi if not even better.
column2:
>

Flic Hub LR can support Flic 2 buttons scattered in a large apartment or a small house.

column1: We truly want to give you the power to create anything. This is why we created the Flic Hub Javascript SDK. With it, you can write code directly on your Flic Hub – in real time! All you need to get started is a Flic Hub and a web browser, no additional software is needed! Read more under For Developers below.
column2:
>


When we released Flic for the first time, we got an incredible amount of requests from creatives, developers and entrepreneurs that wanted Flic buttons to work for their corporate applications. Luckily, we could do almost anything they wanted because Flic is so versatile. We provided code they could apply and a plastic casing for Flic that we could print logos on. 

Here are a few examples:
column3:
>

 

We love to talk about the sports fishing app Anglr, who uses PbF buttons (a white label version of the original Flic) to drop location pins whenever a fish is caught. Anglers with wet and slimy hands can't pull up their smartphones when they’ve just caught a fish! Dominos pizza with their pizza button, Pizza Hut with their pizza ordering shoes (yep) and Clarion Hotels' ""Save Me"" button for boring conferences are all creative and inspiring applications.
column4:
>


Sometimes it is not easy to know how a button can make MY life better. We know that once you start with Flic there is so much to discover, and you will soon find Flic shortcuts in your life that can range from mildly convenient to life-saving. Here are some simple getting started ideas:

column1: • A find-your-phone button in your hallway - push it and your phone will blink and make some noise.
• A next-slide button for your presentation connected to your laptop - push to advance, push twice to go backward.
• An ""I'm-home-from school button"" - for your kids to easily let you know that they're home safe.
• An in your car share-your-location-with-your-spouse button. Send a geo-tag of where you are so that your spouse can see how far you are from home.
• A play/pause/next-song button in your pocket so you don’t have to tap your headphones or talk to a voice assistant on the run.
• A counter button to register habits - get a detailed view of how often you change diapers on your baby, how often you drink coffee, where and when you smoke, or at what times you go to sleep.

column7: >
column9:
>


You can control most things and services when Flic is connected to your phone or when it's connected to a Flic Hub. 

When a Flic button is connected to your smartphone, it can also control functions in your phone, such as Find My Phone, Camera Shutter, Share GPS Location, and more. However, this requires your phone to always be near your Flic button.

If you intend to have Flic buttons in stationary places at home or in the office, the Flic Hub is for you. The Hub ensures a reliable experience as you do not have to worry about the connection being lost when your smartphone is not near the buttons. Additionally, other people can use the Flic buttons when you are not around.
column10:
>

 

Furthermore, a Flic Hub LR can handle many more Flic buttons than a phone. Using a hub is also the only way to use the IR blaster, Apple HomeKit, and Bluetooth Long Range.
column11:
>


By backing this campaign you give proof that you support what we do. Your funding helps us develop the products and as a thank you, we send you the rewards that you want as soon as they are finished. 

When you support this campaign:

column1: • You get Flic 2 and the Flic Hub LR at a much lower price than what will be available after the campaign.
• You receive the products before everyone else.
• You can help to shape the products as you want by giving early comments and feedback, and by participating in polls and surveys.
• If you want to be *really* early with trying the products, you can apply to be a beta tester (and accept on some bugs!)

column2:
>


Our current target for starting to ship is September. As with any crowdfunding campaign, an exact reward shipping date cannot be promised as there are things that remain in the product development. We would rather delay a shipment than shipping products that we are not proud of.
column3:
>

 

Flic 2

We have already kicked off the production tooling for Flic 2 so we’re well on the way but there’s still a lot of fine tuning left to be done which we hope we can finalize before end of June to start ramping up the production in July. As soon as we have a production worthy sample we can also start certifying the product. 

Flic Hub LR

The Flic Hub LR is using the same design as the original Hub and therefore the tooling is already in place. The electronics is already designed and tested as well! A lot of the software can be ported from the previous Hub but there’s quite a few new features which requires development time and effort such as Long Range and 5Ghz Wifi which also significantly increases cost and requirements during for the certification process.
column4:
>


For every Flic 2 you receive we include a CR2032 battery and our micro-suction adhesive pad. For every Flic Hub LR you receive, there is a USB cable included. A power adapter is not included.
column5:
>


Label sticker pack: Add $2 to any reward to get a label sticker pack.

Metal Clip: Add $3 to any reward per metal clip that you want. Bundle offers are available for certain rewards.

IR Accessory: Add $15 to any reward that includes a Flic Hub LR. 

How will you know exactly what I wanted? We will send surveys after the campaign and if there is any doubt we will reach out to you directly and ask you!
column6:
>


All rewards will be shipped from Sweden. For EU and US VAT and sales tax are included in the rewards. EU and US customers will not be charged any import taxes. For all other countries, taxes and duties may apply.
column7:
>

 

Why? We learned the hard way that we can't ship to countries where our products are not certified or other reasons, they'll get stuck in customs. If you think this makes no sense, let us know! We may very well be wrong about your country.
column8:
>

Shortcut Labs was founded in Stockholm over six years ago. What drove us then and what still drives us is the love for buttons that we share with our community.

We want to make life simple for everyone, whether they're a super-user with all the smart home gadgets or a toddler who simply wants a light switch that can be mounted right next to their bed.

Controlling everything we do with our phones can become frustrating, tiresome and anti-social (as we're always looking at a screen). Voice is a wonderful tool but, quite simply, it's not always appropriate in all situations. Flic is built to make our interactions with smart devices as simple as pushing a button and, through this, it has the ability to enhance and enrich the lives of millions of people every single day.
column9:
>


This is our journey and what we're striving to achieve. We'd love you to be part of it.
column10:
>


After a few months of tracking his nicotine consumption on his smartphone Joacim, Flic's co-founder decided enough was enough. He had to get out his smartphone, unlock it, find the right app, and then finally register his consumption. It was frustrating, it was painful, and it was complicated. Surely there had to be a more straightforward way?

Shortcut Labs was founded in 2013 with the mission to create the world's smartest button. The first version of Flic came out on crowdfunding platform Indiegogo for the first time in 2014. Not only was it able to count nicotine consumption, but a wide range of things were possible. Flic had to be connected to an iOS or Android phone, and the Flic team built every single action right into the Flic Apps. It was a great success, as almost fifteen thousand people backed the campaign. 

Since then, Flic and Shortcut Labs have been on a rollercoaster startup ride, and today, Joacim and the Flic team have shipped almost half a million shortcut buttons to 85 countries around the world. Flic integrates with hundreds of technologies we all use daily. Every Flic user has a story to tell about how they use their button. From helping them create perfect morning routines to being the guardian angel that keeps their home safe, there are thousands of innovative and imaginative ways Flic is used. But underneath all of them, one thing always remains the same - Flic makes life simple. A shortcut and a life-hack in the form of a button that brings smiles to millions of faces every day.
column12:
>

Flic 2 looks similar to our previous PbF buttons or ""Flic Single"" buttons, much because we found this design close to perfect. But Flic 2 is different from its predecessors in many ways. The outer shape is improved, the battery can be replaced, and the surface material has been perfected. But that's just the plastics. The really big differences are in the circuit board and software.
column13:
>

 

The Flic 2 circuit board packs a lot more powerful components.
column14:
>


And so does the Hub LR!
column16:
>


The new Flic products are completely backward compatible with all previous Flic products. If you have Flic buttons, they will work with the new Flic Hub LR, and if you have an original Flic Hub, it’ll work with Flic 2.
column17:
>


 

The Bluetooth Long Range capability is only achieved with Flic 2 connected with Flic Hub LR, and you can still connect original Flics to your Flic Hub LR at the same time. 

The Flic App for iOS, Android, and Mac will all support Flic 2s. Long range technology will only be available if your receiving device (phone/laptop) has Bluetooth 5.0 Long Range, however. 

Apps that have implemented the previous Flic SDK will have to include a new SDK in order to support Flic 2 LR.
column18:
>

As a developer, there are a lot of options for you if you want Flic to work for your application. 

If you have an app, we recommend to include the Flic 2 App SDK which will be available natively for iOS and Android. If you want to develop applications for the Flic Hub, we’ will soon release the Flic Hub Javascript SDK. As usual, there are SDKs and connectivity daemons for other platforms such as Linux and Windows.
column19:
>


No license fees

Use any official Flic software for free, most under the Creative Commons (CC0) license. 

Internet connection not required

Previously, Flic products have required an internet connection in the Bluetooth pairing process. But not any longer! (Dear NASA, we can fulfill your request from 2016 now!) 

Open communication specification

If you want Flic 2 to connect to other hardware devices, we have some good news for you: the Flic 2 Bluetooth communication protocol is open. Meaning that if you don’t want to use our SDKs and daemons, you don’t have to! Write your own protocol implementation using our guidelines and best practices and you can integrate Flic into literally any hardware running Bluetooth Low Energy.
column20:
>


Our old Flic SDKs (yes, we’ve had two) were littered with restrictions and limitations as a result of decisions that were made when we designed the first Flic back in 2014.

This time we have re-worked everything and combined all the good stuff into one SDK that's truly built with openness in mind.

It’s easier to set up and integrate, it has multi-app support, fewer restrictions and it’s more reliable!

Multi-app support

With Flic 2’s new architecture, you can connect multiple apps to the same Flic, which opens up a whole new world of possibilities. This means that we are no longer restricted to using one app for one Flic for a single task. Now you’ll be able to combine a flurry of apps to create your perfect workflow.

Flic Marketplace

To kickstart the ecosystem of Flic 2 enabled apps we’ll introduce a Flic Marketplace. This is where people share app ideas and find other apps that do just the right thing. Here you can request features not only to us but to an entire army of developers!
column21:
>


Smart Phones are great, but if you want to create solutions that aren’t dependant on a smartphone being around, something that always just works, then the Flic Hub SDK is for you.

The Flic Hub SDK with a super easy-to-use programming environment lets you write code directly on the Flic Hub!
column22:
>

No Tools Required

We wanted to make coding on the Flic Hub accessible to everyone. All you need to get started is a Flic Hub and a web browser, no additional software is needed! Simply log in through our developer portal and connect to our web-based development environment. Start live coding directly on the hub within minutes!

JavaScript API

We created an easy JavaScript API that takes care of all the complicated parts and lets you focus on Your Ideas. However, if you want to get technical, there are advanced, low-level APIs as well.

Share Your Work

When you're done you can, of course, share your work to let other people take advantage of your awesome ideas!

Large Scale Deployment

For businesses that want to use the Flic Hub in custom solutions at scale, we offer a Device Management platform that lets you push applications to hubs in your domain instantly.
column23:
>


Zero Setup

We are also working on a Device Management Platform for large scale deployments of the Flic Hub. For Hubs in the Device Management Platform, there will be an ability to Cloud Configure Hubs. This means that you can assign new Hubs to specific configurations and ship them directly to customers without ever having to open the box. When the client plugs in power and Ethernet, the Hub will fetch its configuration and set itself up automatically. If you are interested in the Device Management Platform let us know and we can sign you up on a pre-release.
column24:
>


If you have an app, a product or a web service that can be enhanced with Flic buttons, you can monetize on your user base by providing information about Flic or selling Flics that have your logo. We can take care of the entire chain from the point of sale until delivery to your customers. Get in touch with our sales team to find out more!
column25:
>

We take your privacy very seriously, and that’s not just something we say. With Flic 2, we have changed our mindset. When we created the original Flic, we wanted to collect data in order to individualize and improve the experience for our users, but that’s not how we see it now. We don’t want your data anymore. With our products today and in the future, you can feel safe in that we know nothing about you or about how you use your Flic buttons. We still collect anonymized statistics in the apps so that we can spot bugs and so we can see which functions are popular and not. You can read our current Privacy Policy here, however, we are constantly improving it.
column26:
>

How does Flic work?

Flic connects to an iOS or Android phone, a Flic Hub, a computer, or other Bluetooth Low Energy-capable hardware with a Flic software. When Flic is pushed, it activates a pre-defined function. This function can either be something directly on a device - such as making a sound for you to find your phone - or something else such as turning on a light or sending a pre-set email.

How many functions can I pre-define in my Flic 2?

Flic can be activated with three different triggers: Single Push, Double Push and Hold. With each trigger you can set several different functions so a single push can turn off your morning alarm, start dimming up the lights and turn on the news channel on your TV, all at the same time.

What is the range of my Flic?

Flic 2 works up to 50 meters away from your smartphone and up to 200 meters if you use the Flic Hub Long Range with a clear line of sight.

What is my Flic’s battery life?

We have optimized the battery life to last as long as possible. For most use-cases, it will last up to three years or 60 000 clicks. Flic 2 also has a replaceable battery. Just twist the backside using the metal clip or the adhesive back, and replace it with a regular coin cell battery (CR2032).

I have Flic 1 already, will they work with the new Hub LR or do I need to buy new Flics?

Yes, all old Flics will work perfectly with the Flic Hub LR, but not with Long Range. When we release Apple HomeKit later this year, this will also work with the old Flics (but not the old Flic Hub).

What is IR and how does it control my TV, set-top box, etc...?

In a nutshell, Flic can replace all your remote controls! IR means infrared and it's the way that old remote controls communicate with TV’s, sound systems, air conditioners and more. We have developed an IR blaster accessory that you can connect to the hub that works like these old remote controls. This means you can clear the clutter on your coffee table and put old remote controls in the drawer as Flic can now replace their common commands. 

Will I have to pay import taxes on my order?

EU and US customers will not be charged any import taxes. For all other countries please see this link if there are any import taxes for your country, keep in mind that the numbers on this website are only indicative.

I have moved and have a new address, what do I do?

You will receive a survey from BackerKit where you'll be able to confirm and change your shipping address until the day before we start shipping! If you already know that you're going to move in the next 2-3 months let us know and we can check with you before we ship.

I can't find my question in the FAQ’s, what can I do?

Post your question directly in the campaign page and we will get back to you with the answer. Otherwise you can always contact us by sending an e-mail to support@flic.io.

column1: ","Hi Indiegogo! We are a small team from Sweden that loves to push buttons. We invented the Smart Button in 2013 and launched it right here on Indiegogo in 2014. Thanks to our amazing community, we have run two successful crowdfunding campaigns before and delivered on both of them.    Today, we are very excited to show you what we have been up to for the last three years. Indiegogo - welcome Flic 2 and the Flic Hub LR! Flic is a small push button. In the Flic App, you choose what you want to happen when you push, push twice, or hold it down. You don't need to talk to Flic. You don't need to unlock your phone or trust that an AI will figure you out. You just have to push a button.  We’ve taken everything we’ve learned from making smart buttons for over six years, we’ve listened to feedback from the community and revisited every single detail to come up with a product that we sincerely believe is the perfect button.    The Flic Hub is an optional accessory to Flic so you don't have to connect the buttons to your phone. It has also been rebuilt from the ground up to optimize performance, to add HomeKit capability, and to add Bluetooth Long Range.    The most common ways our community use Flic are to toggle lights and control music. But people are really creative, there are literally thousands of wildly different things that people use Flic shortcuts for!   We all have different routines. What we do when we wake up in the morning, how we get to work, and how we structure our day. Flic is a tool that helps you simplify your everyday routines. Instead of different apps or complicated voice commands, structure your life with buttons!   A push-of-a-button life doesn’t have to be complicated. Quite the opposite! Reduce the clutter with technology that just works.

There are a large number of integrations already in the Flic App and ready to use! Through third-party services such as IFTTT, Zapier, and Microsoft Flow, practically anything is possible. And if you're an advanced tech user, with our versatile HTTP Request function you can write your own commands in the Flic App.  Everyone knows how to push a button. We have seen applications for kids, for people with disabilities, for visually impaired, and even for dogs! After 5 years we still see and hear about new amazing things that people do using Flic buttons. Here are just a few things that our community has shared with us:  Flic 2 opens up new opportunities that were not possible before while maintaining the world-class simplicity, stability, and security that Flic has been known for.     The easiest way to set Flic 2 up is with the free Flic App. The most common Flic features are already available there. Here is how the new 2-step pairing with the App works:

The Flic App is already available. Select what you want to happen for each push, double push, and hold. You can even sequence actions, so that multiple things happen when toy push twice, for example.  The micro-suction adhesive is included with every Flic 2. The suction adhesive allows you to attach Flic to any surface. Micro-suction means it contains hundreds of tiny suction cups that don’t leave any residue! The suction pad is easy to clean with water and can be reused many times. Yep, Maria throws it up on the roof in the last scene - it sticks there like a magnet!  Flic 2 is built for accessories. New label stickers make it easy for you and your guests to understand what each button does.    The new rigid multi-purpose metal clip makes Flic easy to attach to keys, clothes, bags, and much more.   Flic 2 can give you visual feedback in three colors: green, yellow, and red. Just like traffic lights! It can blink green if your action was successful, yellow while you’re waiting (not applicable for most uses), and red if there is something wrong.   With Flic 2, you can access any other app that is open for Flic, and developers can build apps for the entire Flic 2 community. This opens up for A LOT more things you can use Flic for! If you develop a use case for Flic 2, it will immediately be made available to the broader Flic audience.    This is something we are extra proud of - Flic 2 can toggle multiple apps at the same time! You can push to turn on the Lights in your lights app and push twice to snooze the alarm-app!   Flic 2 can switch mode between being a smart Flic button, a Bluetooth Keyboard/mouse, or a Low latency MIDI controller. With Flic 2, there are many ways to be truly creative. If you’re a musician for example, it can be configured to imitate a wireless amplifier switch.   Compared to the original Flic, this button is infinitely more flexible and open. There is no longer a requirement to use the Flic App or the Flic Hub or even to have an internet connection when you set it up. As an example, you can implement our open Flic 2 connection protocol in your Arduino robot, or use our free SDKs for iOS, Android, Linux, or OSX, and many more, without making any stability or security compromises. What drove us then and what still drives us is the love for buttons that we share with our community.We want to make life simple for everyone, whether they're a super-user with all the smart home gadgets or a toddler who simply wants a light switch that can be mounted right next to their bed.Controlling everything we do with our phones can become frustrating, tiresome and anti-social (as we're always looking at a screen). Voice is a wonderful tool but, quite simply, it's not always appropriate in all situations. Flic is built to make our interactions with smart devices as simple as pushing a button and, through this, it has the ability to enhance and enrich the lives of millions of people every single day.This is our journey and what we're striving to achieve. We'd love you to be part of it.After a few months of tracking his nicotine consumption on his smartphone Joacim, Flic's co-founder decided enough was enough. He had to get out his smartphone, unlock it, find the right app, and then finally register his consumption. It was frustrating, it was painful, and it was complicated. Surely there had to be a more straightforward way?Shortcut Labs was founded in 2013 with the mission to create the world's smartest button. The first version of Flic came out on crowdfunding platform Indiegogo for the first time in 2014. Not only was it able to count nicotine consumption, but a wide range of things were possible. Flic had to be connected to an iOS or Android phone, and the Flic team built every single action right into the Flic Apps. It was a great success, as almost fifteen thousand people backed the campaign. Since then, Flic and Shortcut Labs have been on a rollercoaster startup ride, and today, Joacim and the Flic team have shipped almost half a million shortcut buttons to 85 countries around the world. Flic integrates with hundreds of technologies we all use daily. Every Flic user has a story to tell about how they use their button. From helping them create perfect morning routines to being the guardian angel that keeps their home safe, there are thousands of innovative and imaginative ways Flic is used. But underneath all of them, one thing always remains the same - Flic makes life simple. A shortcut and a life-hack in the form of a button that brings smiles to millions of faces every day.Flic 2 looks similar to our previous PbF buttons or ""Flic Single"" buttons, much because we found this design close to perfect. But Flic 2 is different from its predecessors in many ways. The outer shape is improved, the battery can be replaced, and the surface material has been perfected. But that's just the plastics. The really big differences are in the circuit board and software.  The Flic 2 circuit board packs a lot more powerful components.   And so does the Hub LR!   The new Flic products are completely backward compatible with all previous Flic products. If you have Flic buttons, they will work with the new Flic Hub LR, and if you have an original Flic Hub, it’ll work with Flic 2.  The Bluetooth Long Range capability is only achieved with Flic 2 connected with Flic Hub LR, and you can still connect original Flics to your Flic Hub LR at the same time. The Flic App for iOS, Android, and Mac will all support Flic 2s. Long range technology will only be available if your receiving device (phone/laptop) has Bluetooth 5.0 Long Range, however. Apps that have implemented the previous Flic SDK will have to include a new SDK in order to support Flic 2 LR.  As a developer, there are a lot of options for you if you want Flic to work for your application. If you have an app, we recommend to include the Flic 2 App SDK which will be available natively for iOS and Android. If you want to develop applications for the Flic Hub, we’ will soon release the Flic Hub Javascript SDK. As usual, there are SDKs and connectivity daemons for other platforms such as Linux and Windows.  No license feesUse any official Flic software for free, most under the Creative Commons (CC0) license. Internet connection not requiredPreviously, Flic products have required an internet connection in the Bluetooth pairing process. But not any longer! (Dear NASA, we can fulfill your request from 2016 now!) Open communication specificationIf you want Flic 2 to connect to other hardware devices, we have some good news for you: the Flic 2 Bluetooth communication protocol is open. Meaning that if you don’t want to use our SDKs and daemons, you don’t have to! Write your own protocol implementation using our guidelines and best practices and you can integrate Flic into literally any hardware running Bluetooth Low Energy.  Our old Flic SDKs (yes, we’ve had two) were littered with restrictions and limitations as a result of decisions that were made when we designed the first Flic back in 2014.This time we have re-worked everything and combined all the good stuff into one SDK that's truly built with openness in mind.It’s easier to set up and integrate, it has multi-app support, fewer restrictions and it’s more reliable!Multi-app supportWith Flic 2’s new architecture, you can connect multiple apps to the same Flic, which opens up a whole new world of possibilities. This means that we are no longer restricted to using one app for one Flic for a single task. Now you’ll be able to combine a flurry of apps to create your perfect workflow.Flic MarketplaceTo kickstart the ecosystem of Flic 2 enabled apps we’ll introduce a Flic Marketplace. This is where people share app ideas and find other apps that do just the right thing. Here you can request features not only to us but to an entire army of developers! Smart Phones are great, but if you want to create solutions that aren’t dependant on a smartphone being around, something that always just works, then the Flic Hub SDK is for you.The Flic Hub SDK with a super easy-to-use programming environment lets you write code directly on the Flic Hub! No Tools RequiredWe wanted to make coding on the Flic Hub accessible to everyone. All you need to get started is a Flic Hub and a web browser, no additional software is needed! Simply log in through our developer portal and connect to our web-based development environment. Start live coding directly on the hub within minutes!JavaScript APIWe created an easy JavaScript API that takes care of all the complicated parts and lets you focus on Your Ideas. However, if you want to get technical, there are advanced, low-level APIs as well.Share Your WorkWhen you're done you can, of course, share your work to let other people take advantage of your awesome ideas!Large Scale DeploymentFor businesses that want to use the Flic Hub in custom solutions at scale, we offer a Device Management platform that lets you push applications to hubs in your domain instantly. Zero SetupWe are also working on a Device Management Platform for large scale deployments of the Flic Hub. For Hubs in the Device Management Platform, there will be an ability to Cloud Configure Hubs. This means that you can assign new Hubs to specific configurations and ship them directly to customers without ever having to open the box. When the client plugs in power and Ethernet, the Hub will fetch its configuration and set itself up automatically. If you are interested in the Device Management Platform let us know and we can sign you up on a pre-release.  If you have an app, a product or a web service that can be enhanced with Flic buttons, you can monetize on your user base by providing information about Flic or selling Flics that have your logo. We can take care of the entire chain from the point of sale until delivery to your customers. Get in touch with our sales team to find out more! We take your privacy very seriously, and that’s not just something we say. With Flic 2, we have changed our mindset. When we created the original Flic, we wanted to collect data in order to individualize and improve the experience for our users, but that’s not how we see it now. We don’t want your data anymore. With our products today and in the future, you can feel safe in that we know nothing about you or about how you use your Flic buttons. We still collect anonymized statistics in the apps so that we can spot bugs and so we can see which functions are popular and not. You can read our current Privacy Policy here, however, we are constantly improving it.   How does Flic work?Flic connects to an iOS or Android phone, a Flic Hub, a computer, or other Bluetooth Low Energy-capable hardware with a Flic software. When Flic is pushed, it activates a pre-defined function. This function can either be something directly on a device - such as making a sound for you to find your phone - or something else such as turning on a light or sending a pre-set email.How many functions can I pre-define in my Flic 2?Flic can be activated with three different triggers: Single Push, Double Push and Hold. With each trigger you can set several different functions so a single push can turn off your morning alarm, start dimming up the lights and turn on the news channel on your TV, all at the same time.What is the range of my Flic?Flic 2 works up to 50 meters away from your smartphone and up to 200 meters if you use the Flic Hub Long Range with a clear line of sight.What is my Flic’s battery life?We have optimized the battery life to last as long as possible. For most use-cases, it will last up to three years or 60 000 clicks. Flic 2 also has a replaceable battery. Just twist the backside using the metal clip or the adhesive back, and replace it with a regular coin cell battery (CR2032).I have Flic 1 already, will they work with the new Hub LR or do I need to buy new Flics?Yes, all old Flics will work perfectly with the Flic Hub LR, but not with Long Range. When we release Apple HomeKit later this year, this will also work with the old Flics (but not the old Flic Hub).What is IR and how does it control my TV, set-top box, etc...?In a nutshell, Flic can replace all your remote controls! IR means infrared and it's the way that old remote controls communicate with TV’s, sound systems, air conditioners and more. We have developed an IR blaster accessory that you can connect to the hub that works like these old remote controls. This means you can clear the clutter on your coffee table and put old remote controls in the drawer as Flic can now replace their common commands. Will I have to pay import taxes on my order?EU and US customers will not be charged any import taxes. For all other countries please see this link if there are any import taxes for your country, keep in mind that the numbers on this website are only indicative.I have moved and have a new address, what do I do?You will receive a survey from BackerKit where you'll be able to confirm and change your shipping address until the day before we start shipping! If you already know that you're going to move in the next 2-3 months let us know and we can check with you before we ship.I can't find my question in the FAQ’s, what can I do?Post your question directly in the campaign page and we will get back to you with the answer. Otherwise you can always contact us by sending an e-mail to support@flic.io.",87.0,0,"4 Campaigns

When we asked about how to improve our surface cleaner everybody wants “Eliminates Bigger Leaves”, and now “Greener”, right? 
So, with all the experience and information obtained over eight years with our award-winning pool surface cleaner SkimmeMotion, we have now developed the next generation of Automatic Surface Cleaners, and our newest family member: we proudly present the SkimmerMotion XTREME!
In its design, we included all the details and feedback of every customer and pool store owner.

It's the most powerful, most efficient, moving cleaning waterfall we've designed up to date. We created it to reach XTREME Levels of Performance, XTREME Simplicity, and Efficiency while maintaining a Sleek Design.
• It handles much bigger leaves and more debris.
• it moves around the pool to reach every corner.
• It connects to your suction-side cleaner in just minutes.
• It cleans and recycles the pool surface 6 Times More than your standard pool pump.
• It’s got a bigger internal “basket” design that helps keep debris more secure.
Keeps your pool surface clean all year round and it's always ready to enjoy.

The moving WATERFALL that eliminates leaves, bugs, dust, pollen, dog hair, and all debris from the pool surface.
Its continuous action focused on the surface, eliminates de debris before it mixes with the water, clarifying the pool.

column5: >SkimmerMotion XTREME moves along your suction side cleaner to reach every corner of your pool.

column1: Never use a pool leaf rake again.

column2: >THE INTERNAL BASKET KEEPS COLLECTED DEBRIS SECURE FOR EASY REMOVAL.
>Smaller debris goes directly to the pool's filtration system.
>Just insert the provided Tee-Joint between the suction side cleaner hose, adjust the suction valve and enjoy a clean pool all year round.
>It comes with a hose and connectors necessary to attach it to all suction-side cleaners.

column1: <table align=""left"" cellpadding=""0"" cellspacing=""0"" hspace=""0"" vspace=""0""><tbody><tr><td align=""left"">

We care about the environment as much as you do. That's why we decided to make the new SkimmerMotion XTREME, with recycled materials and comes in 100% recyclable packaging. We're also making it here in the USA, to reduce our CO2 emissions and energy from transportation.
It reduces the need for chemicals and uses no batteries or electricity.

We choose our injection partner 20 miles from our warehouse.
 Just compare the CO2 emissions saving transporting the parts of our products from 20  miles vs. over 8.000 miles from China or any other place.
SkimmerMotion XTREME design is ready, several prototypes have been working perfectly for months.

We have everything almost ready to start production here in the USA. As soon as the molds arrive. We'll use the same infrastructure we have been using since 2013 to manufacture our Automatic Pool surface cleaner.
• The construction of the molds to start producing has already started.
• With your support we can accelerate the manufacturing process and buy raw material in advance, we want to launch SkimmerMotion XTREME by January 2022.
• To assure the maximum project funding, we are offering One-time Unique Perks of up to 70% for early birds.
• We also have the support of many pool experts backing our product for a faster start.
<li>With your contribution, we'll be able to order the recycled raw materials, finish the box design and fine-tune our distribution &amp

We'll be keeping you (our backers) informed every step of the way.
The construction of the molds has already been stated, which will allow us to deliver the product on the perk’s dates or earlier.
Since this is our second-generation product, we do not foresee any major obstacles to meet our perk dates.
We need NOT ONLY your economical support, but we also need your help to spread the word about SkimmerMotion XTREME, share our campaign, especially with pool owners or friends.

That feeling of guilt for not cleaning your pet’s water dish...

No more! With Drinkie you have an invisible hand that automatically cleans your pet’s dish while you’re away. Featuring a patent-pending Pulse System, the Drinkie dispenser rinses your pet’s dish as many times as you set by the smart app! 

This means zero health risks for your fluffball, and absolutely no hassle for you.
column5:
ct=g"" src=""""/>


Traditional fountains actually suck.

On the one paw, their filters become a source of secondary pollution over time as impurities, dust, food, fur, hair, etc. accumulate there. And on the other paw, you have to replace those filters all the time.

But Drinkie keeps your pet’s water cleaner than any filters. This dispenser needs no filters at all! It belongs to a new generation of dispensers, which deliver clean water to your pet’s dish right from the fresh water tank! Stray whiskers, food particles, and germs simply have no way to get into your fluffy’s dish, as they are rinsed away into a separate airtight waste water tank.

No extra expenses for you and even cleaner water for your fluffball!

And if you’re worried about hard water, we’ve got your back.

You can either use filtered water in the clean water tank or choose our special filters available as add-ons, which serve ONLY for softening hard water.

Unlike traditional filters that purify dirty water, these filters are placed independently in the fresh water tank and DON’T participate in the dirty water cycle.

The purpose of this filter is first of all to take care of your pet’s health, not to protect Drinkie from the scale. Many ingredients in hard water—especially calcium ions can cause urinary system diseases (kidney stones, urethral stones, etc.) and other severe problems in your pets. But with Drinkie’s filter, you can easily soften the water and turn it into a healthy liquid for your pet.

 

Here’s why this filter is ideal for hard water:

column1: Easy to set up: Easily insert the filter in the fresh water tank and press firmly
Ideal for better water quality: Made of ion exchange resin, the filter displaces heavy metal ion, the filter effectively softens hard water, and protects against contamination by limescale
Natural materials:  Made from natural coconut shells, the filter is 100% safe and healthy for your pet

Smart replacing notification: Unlike other dispensers, Drinkie shows its filter’s status on the app and sends you a  notification when it’s time to replace it. Generally, the filter can be used for about 4-8 weeks.
NOTE: If you don’t have a hard water problem, you don’t need to use this filter.
column3:
ct=g"" src=""""/>


To stay healthy, your pet needs to drink a cup of fresh water (0.8 oz/lb) daily.

With 106 oz (3 Liters) fresh water storage and 35 oz (1 Liter) waste water storage, you can trust Drinkie to provide sufficient water to your pet for up to 5 days! Go on a vacation, stay late at work or go on a trip without worrying your fur friend’s water will end too soon. 

The smart app will always notify you when the water in the dispenser is about to finish.
column7:
ct=g"" src=""""/>


How much do you trust your roommate or housesitter to refill your pet’s water tank?

With Drinkie’s intuitive app, you can do that yourself, with only a few clicks.
 


There’s even more to this...

column1: • Monitor your pet’s drinking habits (water consumption, drinking times)

- Schedule mode (set how often and exactly what time Drinkie should rinse the dish, e.g. 2x per day, one at 8:00 am, the other at 7:00pm)

- Intelligent Mode (Set the frequency of rinsing, Drinkie will self-clean and refill fresh water for your pet intelligently)
• Share your pet’s information with your families and friends within the app

column3:
ct=g"" src=""""/>


One more thing: Without the smart app setup and WiFi Drinkie will function just as a regular dispenser, refilling the water in the dish throughout the day. But once you use the smart app and set the rinsing time, it will turn into a smart dispenser, cleaning your pet’s dish as many times as you set.

In fact, Drinkie will continue to loyally do its job even if you have no WiFi connection or your phone is broken unless you change its settings.
 


 


No worries about Drinkie’s materials! 

Drinkie is made from the same materials used for kids, specifically SMMA, SAN, PP, and silicone. These 100% pet-safe, BPA-free, reliable and recyclable materials are scratch-resistant, durable, and made to serve water to your pets safely for years!

But there’s even more to this! 

Unlike other dispensers and fountains, Drinkie doesn’t use any chemicals or UV light to clean the dish, making it absolutely safe for your pet.

Drinkie also has no static electricity build-up, no way to break inside or disconnect the power. Your child—human or not—simply has no way to get hurt, even if they try too hard.
 


 


Drinkie will keep your fluffy’s dish always full.

Simply fill the fresh water tank with water and the dispenser will top up the dish throughout the day once only 4/5 water is left inside.

The fluffy won’t be left thirsty at night either: Drinkie will continue to passively replenish the dish once only 1/5 water is left.

Drinkie also ensures your fluffy never gets scared while drinking: The dispenser will replenish the dish fast only when its sensors detect your pet isn’t around. And if they’re near, it will slow down the speed of water replenishment for them to enjoy their drink.
>With Drinkie you can save lots of time on washing your pet’s water dish.

column1:
Because it’s automatically cleaning the dish every day, the only time you have to wash the containers and the dish yourself is when the water in the fresh water tank is over. Meaning about once every 5 days instead of several times a day.

Whenever it’s time to refill, just take out the tanks and the dish, hand wash them with water under 60°C degrees and fill the fresh water tank again. As simple as that.

With Drinkie, power cuts won’t get in the way of your pet’s water supply.

Drinkie works both with backup batteries and electricity. If the electricity suddenly goes out, don’t worry: the rechargeable batteries can supply power to the dispenser for up to a week, ensuring your pet never stays thirsty. Emergencies are no longer a problem, especially when you’re away!

In fact, Drinkie comes with 2 plug versions—US and international. The first one is a US standard plug, while the international version is a cable that can be detached and reattached to UK/EU/AU standard plugs.
column3:
ct=g"" src=""""/>


 


Forget about rejected bowls and dehydrated fluffies!

Drinkie is designed with your pet’s comfort and physiology in mind. With its shallow, whisker-friendly dish and the perfect height, your pet will love coming back to it again and again.
 


 


 

*Please note that when backing Drinkie and its add-ons you won’t be charged the shipping fee on Indiegogo. We'll request you to pay it prior to the product shipping and you'll be charged later via fulfillment survey.

If you backed Drinkie during the 1st week of the campaign when the shipping destinations were limited, don’t worry. Now that we have worldwide shipping, you’ll be able to add your destination in the final survey.

Check out the shipping chart below to learn more about the shipping fee for 1X and 2X units for your country or region. 


As for the shipping fees of our add-ons, the filters, 1-year extra warranty, and the Club Card come with free shipping.

For all the other add-ons, the shipping fee will be $3.
column5:
ct=g"" src=""""/>
 


 

We spent tireless months enjoying the process of bringing Drinkie by Cheerble to life. Now the development of the product is almost complete.

Currently, we are finally done with the structural design and the adjustments on Drinkie’s appearance design. Now it looks simply pawesome!

Also, we are communicating with the mold supplier about the details of the final mold tooling, and conducting a noteworthy test in the subsequent assembly.
 

The hardware design and IOT firmware design have been completed as well. Now, a complete functional test is being carried out in conjunction with the App.

As to the development of the Android version App, we’re done with it too! We’re also working on combining the Android version App with the product itself (Drinkie) for a complete functional test. The aim is to ensure the fluency of spraying water and the amount of spraying water
column6:
the accuracy of pets drinking water (the accuracy of statistical data), etc. The iOS app is still under development.

And lastly, we’re testing our newly added filter for its effect on hard water softening. Fortunately, the supplier we cooperated with gave us a sample that can achieve that effect!
 


We've painstakingly chosen all the materials and production processes involved in the making of Cheerble Drinkie to ensure it's of the highest quality. However, slight changes may be made to the final product to make it even better and ship out to you without any flaws. In any case, we promise to update you promptly and explain the nature and rationale behind any change.

 

Functional Prototype (Demo)

One more thing: Without the smart app setup and WiFi Drinkie will function just as a regular dispenser, refilling the water in the dish throughout the day. But once you use the smart app and set the rinsing time, it will turn into a smart dispenser, cleaning your pet’s dish as many times as you set.In fact, Drinkie will continue to loyally do its job even if you have no WiFi connection or your phone is broken unless you change its settings.  No worries about Drinkie’s materials! Drinkie is made from the same materials used for kids, specifically SMMA, SAN, PP, and silicone. These 100% pet-safe, BPA-free, reliable and recyclable materials are scratch-resistant, durable, and made to serve water to your pets safely for years!But there’s even more to this! Unlike other dispensers and fountains, Drinkie doesn’t use any chemicals or UV light to clean the dish, making it absolutely safe for your pet.Drinkie also has no static electricity build-up, no way to break inside or disconnect the power. Your child—human or not—simply has no way to get hurt, even if they try too hard.  Drinkie will keep your fluffy’s dish always full.Simply fill the fresh water tank with water and the dispenser will top up the dish throughout the day once only 4/5 water is left inside.The fluffy won’t be left thirsty at night either: Drinkie will continue to passively replenish the dish once only 1/5 water is left.Drinkie also ensures your fluffy never gets scared while drinking: The dispenser will replenish the dish fast only when its sensors detect your pet isn’t around. And if they’re near, it will slow down the speed of water replenishment for them to enjoy their drink.
With Drinkie you can save lots of time on washing your pet’s water dish.

Because it’s automatically cleaning the dish every day, the only time you have to wash the containers and the dish yourself is when the water in the fresh water tank is over. Meaning about once every 5 days instead of several times a day.Whenever it’s time to refill, just take out the tanks and the dish, hand wash them with water under 60°C degrees and fill the fresh water tank again. As simple as that.With Drinkie, power cuts won’t get in the way of your pet’s water supply.Drinkie works both with backup batteries and electricity. If the electricity suddenly goes out, don’t worry: the rechargeable batteries can supply power to the dispenser for up to a week, ensuring your pet never stays thirsty. Emergencies are no longer a problem, especially when you’re away!In fact, Drinkie comes with 2 plug versions—US and international. The first one is a US standard plug, while the international version is a cable that can be detached and reattached to UK/EU/AU standard plugs. Forget about rejected bowls and dehydrated fluffies!Drinkie is designed with your pet’s comfort and physiology in mind. With its shallow, whisker-friendly dish and the perfect height, your pet will love coming back to it again and again.   *Please note that when backing Drinkie and its add-ons you won’t be charged the shipping fee on Indiegogo. We'll request you to pay it prior to the product shipping and you'll be charged later via fulfillment survey.If you backed Drinkie during the 1st week of the campaign when the shipping destinations were limited, don’t worry. Now that we have worldwide shipping, you’ll be able to add your destination in the final survey.Check out the shipping chart below to learn more about the shipping fee for 1X and 2X units for your country or region. As for the shipping fees of our add-ons, the filters, 1-year extra warranty, and the Club Card come with free shipping.For all the other add-ons, the shipping fee will be $3.   We spent tireless months enjoying the process of bringing Drinkie by Cheerble to life. Now the development of the product is almost complete.Currently, we are finally done with the structural design and the adjustments on Drinkie’s appearance design. Now it looks simply pawesome!Also, we are communicating with the mold supplier about the details of the final mold tooling, and conducting a noteworthy test in the subsequent assembly. The hardware design and IOT firmware design have been completed as well. Now, a complete functional test is being carried out in conjunction with the App.As to the development of the Android version App, we’re done with it too! We’re also working on combining the Android version App with the product itself (Drinkie) for a complete functional test. The aim is to ensure the fluency of spraying water and the amount of spraying water
column2: the accuracy of pets drinking water (the accuracy of statistical data), etc. The iOS app is still under development.And lastly, we’re testing our newly added filter for its effect on hard water softening. Fortunately, the supplier we cooperated with gave us a sample that can achieve that effect! We've painstakingly chosen all the materials and production processes involved in the making of Cheerble Drinkie to ensure it's of the highest quality. However, slight changes may be made to the final product to make it even better and ship out to you without any flaws. In any case, we promise to update you promptly and explain the nature and rationale behind any change. Functional Prototype (Demo)",59.0,2,"4 Campaigns

Bodu knives are specially crafted to resist corrosion from water and acids (citrus, tomatoes, etc.) without voiding our lifetime guarantee.

Because of our unique handles, there are no rivets or wood to worry about early knife failure or trapped bacteria &

CITRUS SAFE

Bodu knives are resistant to tarnish from citrus or acidic foods.

 

LIFETIME GUARANTEE

We stand by our knives with a lifetime guarantee from manufacture defects and will replace your knives if they do not meet our high standards in quality and workmanship.

column1:
WHY CHOOSE BODU KNIVES

Choosing kitchen knives can be overwhelming. The wrong choice often ends in ruined knives or blades that will not stay sharp.

Currently on the market is:

1. Inexpensively priced knives that use inferior steel or ceramic that does not last. Many of these knives falsely advertise their steel and use cost-cutting manufacturing processes.

2. Mid-tier priced knives that use plastic and wood handles that warp, melt, separate with blades that don’t hold an edge and often lack balance, aesthetics, and longevity.

​3. Premium-priced knives that are expensive and require extra care for the blades and handles.

 

Bodu is changing the game

Our knives are designed from the ground up to perfectly balance beauty, functionality, sharpness, ease of maintenance, and lifelong durably at an affordable price.

The difference is in our:

It's a combination that makes Bodu knives truly unique and designed for a lifetime of enjoyment.

Manufactured in our factory with over 30+ years of experience. Combining traditional artistry with modern-day technology improves quality, efficiency, and cost.

 

DIRECT TO YOU

Traditional retailers mark up the products they sell between 50 and 100%. Bodu skips the middlemen markup and passes the savings directly to you with our pre-order campaign here on IndieGoGo.

 

KNIFE SPECIFICATIONS
<li>A perfect balance of artistic beauty, functionality &amp
• Made from 73 layers of premium 316 stainless Damascus steel
High carbon 10Cr15CoMoV core for durable razor sharpness
15° double bevel edge for razor sharpness &
Solid sand cast handle made of premium 304 stainless steel (no fillers)
• No hollow voids or multi-materials to trap food and bacteria
• Lifetime guarantee from manufacture defects

Unlike other knives that use stamped metal, Bodu knives are hand-crafted, forged steel. 

Made from premium Damascus (layered) 316 stainless steel around a high carbon 10Cr15CoMoV core for beauty, durability and razor sharpness.

THE RIGHT KNIFE FOR THE RIGHT JOB

To ensure every kitchen need is covered, we designed a six-piece knife set based on extensive feedback from both home chefs and professional cooks. 

 

KNIFE HOLDER

We've updated the design of our knife holder based on feedback from our beta testers. The knife holder is available as an add-on for the 3 knives and 6 knives sets. You'll also have the option of adding the holder to your order later in the campaign.

 

HOW TO ORDER
• Click on the ""Back It"" or ""Select a Perk"" button
• Choose between the Full Set of Six, Basic Set of Three, or Single Chef Knife

No need to enter shipping address. We will reach out to you to collect your shipping address closer to shipping time in November.

 

SHIPPING COSTS &
column2:
ADDRESSES

Your shipping address as well as shipping cost will be collected a few weeks before shipping in November.  We will contact you via email as well as via updates on our IndieGoGo page. Estimated shipping cost to USA addresses is expected to be under $35 for the set of 6 knives. Our promise to you is full transparency and at cost (or less) shipping fees. We are doing it this way to make it easier for everyone to get their knives delivered to the correct address.

 

DESIGNED FOR LIFE

Bodu knives were created because of the team's personal experience with ruined knives. It only takes one accidental ride through the dishwasher to ruin a wooden handle.

Or one forgetful night after cutting lemons and not properly cleaning to tarnish most knives.

Bodu knives went through dozens of design iterations and prototyping before arriving at the final design.

Once the Bodu team was satisfied with the knife design, they turned their attention to the manufacturing process.

Not only are Bodu knives made of the highest quality materials, great lengths are taken during manufacturing to ensure a lifetime of performance.

Bodu blades are made of 73 layers of premium steel.

The inner core of 10Cr15CoMoV steel provides a durable, razor sharp edge while the surrounding 72 layers of 316 stainless steel provide rigidity and protection (for a total of 73 layers).

Without the outer layers, the knife would be too brittle and less resistant to water and acidic corrosion. Without the core layer, the knife would not maintain a sharp edge. It's the perfect balance of beauty and functionality. 

 

MANUFACTURED TO PERFECTION

All Bod knives go through a rigorous 15 step process during manufacturing. While innovations in manufacturing technology helps keep Bodu knives affordable, absolutely no corners are cut or expense spared.
column3:
>Bodu's 15 Step Process

The processes for making Bodu knifes:

Laser cutting the blades:

A computer controlled laser cuts out the desired profile of the knife blade from the welded stack of 73 layers.

Forging:

The fishbone pattern is power hammered into the red hot blade. Then the still red hot blade goes through flattening rollers.

Thermal process:

Vacuum heat treatment. (1100 degrees) Ice hardened by quenching in temperatures below sub zero(with liquid N2). With this process, the structure of the stainless steel material changes and the blade becomes hard. Finally, tempering (@400 degrees) for 8 hours. This results in a blade that is not only hard and tough but also elastic.

Steel handle casting:

The steel handle is sand cast and ground. The handle is then prepped for welding.

Handle welding to blade:

The handle is welded to the blade and the weld is ground smooth.

Periphery polishing and surface grinding:

The periphery of the blade is polished with a polishing belt. A computer-controlled whetstone adjusts the shape of the knife. Then the surface of the blade tip is thinly ground using a surface grinding process.

Blade leveling and grazing:

The blade leveling process consists in polishing the blade edge with a particular polishing material. Then, the entire blade is more finely polished using a grazing process and the entire blade is polished.

Mirror polishing / Abrasive blasting:

To obtain a finish finer than that obtained by the grazing process, the blade is inserted between two rollers and is polished with a mirror finish.

Abrasive blasting:

The blade is abrasive blasted by shooting glass beads at it. The slight differences of the steel's surface hardness, where one layer meets another, is accentuated and the unique topographic patterns appear on the blade. These patterns are the designs that characterize Damascus kitchen knives.

Knife polishing:

The assembled knife is polished by expert craftsmen.

Printing / marking:

Each kitchen knife has a laser etched mark printed on it. The mark includes the brand name, blade chemistry, structure, hardness, and lot ID

Wet type blade edging:

By grinding and pouring water on the whetstone, it is possible to avoid the production of friction heat which greatly increases the smoothness and the cutting quality of blade's edge. Only workmen with many years of experience are allowed to carry out this important process.

Final touches:

All burrs (ragged edges formed during grinding) are removed using tanned leather.

Inspection and Packing:

The cutting quality of knives' blades are checked individually. In order to insure maximum sharpness in cutting and durability, the blades should have a specific blade angle. The blade angles of the knives are strictly inspected and controlled with measuring instruments. Then, the completed knives are carefully packed in boxes and shipped.

column1:
WHY PRE-ORDER ON INDIEGOGO

Our dream is to create a home goods company supplying sculpted, utilitarian products at affordable prices. By pre-ordering Bodu knives on IndieGoGo, you're helping make this dream a reality.

To keep costs down (and pass along the savings to you), we're collecting pre-orders on IndieGoGo for a limited time.

IndieGoGo is a crowdfunding platform. That means our pre-order campaign only lasts for about 30 days. You can cancel your order without any questions during the campaign. We want you to be 100% happy with your decision to pre-order Bodu knives!

After the campaign ends, IndieGoGo sends us (Bodu) the funds raised which we use to manufacture and deliver the knives to you.

Manufacturing is ready to go. We do not expect any significant delivery delays.

 

TIMELINE

MANUFACTURING STATUS

Thanks to our early backers here on IndieGoGo, we have started the first phase of manufacturing ahead of schedule!

The images below show how the sand cast handles are meticulously hand welded to the blades for strength, durability, and precision.

ABOUT US

We want to create products that we use every day and that others would want as well. We want art and function in our lives and hands every day. We started with kitchen knives because they are the essential tools in a kitchen. We turned to Damani Thomas, owner and head chef of Oswald Restaurant in Santa Cruz, CA for assistance in selecting which knives would be most valued for the home cook.

Thank you for your support! We know you are going to love your Bodu knives as much as we do. They are truly works of art for everyday use.

Questions or comments?

Let us know. We're here to help! Send us a message on IndieGoGo, comment on the page, or drop us an email at david@bodugoods.com

We created the LumiCube to allow people interested in technology to focus on creating and experimenting, and bring their ideas to life. Let us tell you a bit about it...

 

 

WHAT IS IT?

 

We think of the LumiCube as the ultimate Raspberry Pi kit. Perfect for beginners and enthusiasts alike. It takes the Raspberry Pi, a powerful mini computer, and combines it with a whole range of electronics and sensors, from a speaker to an accelerometer all in a 10cm cube - the perfect playground for your creations.

 

 

 

 

WHAT CAN IT DO?

 

Most of your day-to-day devices, like your phone, alarm clock, and voice activated home assistant all have the same basic electronic components. So we thought why not put them all together with a mini computer and make it completely programmable. That way you can build whatever you want, exactly the way you want it.

With so much at your fingertips, let your imagination take the lead.

 

 

 

 

WHO IS IT FOR?

 

 

 

 

LEVEL UP YOUR ROOM

 

Keep updated with important events thanks to its built in WiFi. Unlike other tickers you can connect to any feed you want. Whether you're on Discord or Mastodon, or investing in the most niche of cryptocurrencies, get the updates you care about.

Or if humans are your thing, use it to message your loved ones!

 

 

 

MAKE SOMETHING INTERACTIVE

 

If you choose the the advanced kit you can use light levels, hand gestures or buttons to control the cube. You will also be able to make it react to movement or rotation, to give your projects an exciting interactive element.

 

 

 

PERFECT FOR YOUR DESK

 

Whether lit up, or just sitting quietly, the LumiCube is small enough to sit on your desk, and look great whilst doing it. Use it to notify you of important events, automate routine tasks, or help you focus by providing some background sounds.

 

 

 

AWARE OF ITS ENVIRONMENT

 

The advanced kit features an environmental sensor, so you can monitor your home or office environment. Plus it automatically records the values of all its sensors over time, so you can look back at the temperature, humidity and air pressure variations of your space.

 

 

 

MAKE PROGRAMMING FUN AGAIN

 

Every part of the LumiCube is programmable, using our browser based coding environment. We’ve worked hard to remove any complexity, so you can achieve real results with just a few lines of code. Sometimes modern technology can feel overwhelmingly complicated – with the LumiCube we set out to make programming fun again!

 

 

 

 

WE GAVE IT TO SOME FRIENDS...

 

... and despite some of them not knowing Python, within minutes they had it displaying an abusive message. Then they ran the rain animation and decided it was more fun to rain fire, so changed the colour to red. After that they modified the autumn tree scene, and changed the colours to white and grey for a winter tree, and made it drop leaves when it was shaken. During this time they also managed to Rickroll each other. So we think it's fair to say it's pretty easy and fun to get started.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

 

WELCOME TO INTERACTIVE CODING 

 

Coding for electronics used to be a mysterious process, but the LumiCube comes with a dashboard so you can see what matters all in one place, all to support your creative exploration.

View the state of your cube in real-time – no more guessing, as you can see every value, and plot them on a graph.

 

 

 

WANT TO LEARN PYTHON?

 

You don’t have to be a Python expert to use the LumiCube – in fact we think it’s a great way to learn. Unlike learning programming on a blank computer terminal, the LumiCube gives you some fun projects to play around with straight away. All of those built in apps are just code that you can modify and play around with. Plus we include a project booklet to introduce the basics of Python and guide you through some of the built in apps.

 

 

 

NO CODING NEEDED: LOADS OF BUILT IN APPS

 

Just select one and click run. You can still see the code and tweak it in any way you want.

 

 

 

 

 

COMMUNITY OF LUMICUBERS

 

Share your projects with your friends, or take inspiration by running super cool projects by LumiCubers worldwide.

Collaborate to make something beyond the reach of one person (unless you're the guy from StuffMadeHere!)

 

 

 

SO MANY POSSIBILITIES

 

 The LumiCube has dozens of inputs and outputs, which can be combined in any way you want:

 

 

 

WHAT WILL YOU CREATE?

 

Maybe a musical cube that reacts to the beat?

 

 

 

 

MORE THAN WE CAN FIT ON THIS PAGE

column1: • REST end-points for all the electronics, so you can use any language you like from any machine!

SHIPPING

We are planning to ship from two warehouses. One based in the EU/UK and one in the US. This means if you are in the UK, EU or the US you won't have to pay any customs or duties. If you are outside these areas you may owe duty and taxes based on your local regulations.

 

 

PLUG &
column2:
PLAY ELECTRONICS

 

Our journey began with creating plug-and-play electronics modules. We felt creating your own electronics projects was too frustrating. From cryptic datasheets, and fragile bread-boarding, to fruitless searching for drivers on the internet. 

So we created a system of electronic modules that could be just plugged together, starting with modules for LEDs, buttons, screens and a range of sensors. We then thought: why not put it all together in a nice case? And so the LumiCube was born. The perfect platform for loads of interesting projects.

For us, the LumiCube is just the beginning. We hope to soon start selling the modules separately so that other people can just as easily create their own electronics projects. Want to add servo motors to your project? Just plug in the servo module. Want to detect distances? Plug in the distance sensor.

 

 

 

OUR MISSION

 

We are two friends on a mission to bring the joy of tinkering with technology to as wide an audience as possible. We are developing an environment where anyone can create their own electronics and it's super simple to program. A system that is simple enough for teenagers to create the robots they always imagined, but advanced enough for researchers to use to automate lab work.

 Pros at work!

Use it to notify you of important events, automate routine tasks, or help you focus by providing some background sounds.   AWARE OF ITS ENVIRONMENT The advanced kit features an environmental sensor, so you can monitor your home or office environment. Plus it automatically records the values of all its sensors over time, so you can look back at the temperature, humidity and air pressure variations of your space.   MAKE PROGRAMMING FUN AGAIN Every part of the LumiCube is programmable, using our browser based coding environment. We’ve worked hard to remove any complexity, so you can achieve real results with just a few lines of code. Sometimes modern technology can feel overwhelmingly complicated – with the LumiCube we set out to make programming fun again!    WE GAVE IT TO SOME FRIENDS... ... and despite some of them not knowing Python, within minutes they had it displaying an abusive message. Then they ran the rain animation and decided it was more fun to rain fire, so changed the colour to red. After that they modified the autumn tree scene, and changed the colours to white and grey for a winter tree, and made it drop leaves when it was shaken. During this time they also managed to Rickroll each other. So we think it's fair to say it's pretty easy and fun to get started.   WELCOME TO INTERACTIVE CODING  Coding for electronics used to be a mysterious process, but the LumiCube comes with a dashboard so you can see what matters all in one place, all to support your creative exploration.View the state of your cube in real-time – no more guessing, as you can see every value, and plot them on a graph.   WANT TO LEARN PYTHON? You don’t have to be a Python expert to use the LumiCube – in fact we think it’s a great way to learn. Unlike learning programming on a blank computer terminal, the LumiCube gives you some fun projects to play around with straight away. All of those built in apps are just code that you can modify and play around with. Plus we include a project booklet to introduce the basics of Python and guide you through some of the built in apps.   NO CODING NEEDED: LOADS OF BUILT IN APPS Just select one and click run. You can still see the code and tweak it in any way you want.     COMMUNITY OF LUMICUBERS Share your projects with your friends, or take inspiration by running super cool projects by LumiCubers worldwide.Collaborate to make something beyond the reach of one person (unless you're the guy from StuffMadeHere!)   SO MANY POSSIBILITIES  The LumiCube has dozens of inputs and outputs, which can be combined in any way you want:   WHAT WILL YOU CREATE? Maybe a musical cube that reacts to the beat?    MORE THAN WE CAN FIT ON THIS PAGE

column1: All our software is open source.
REST end-points for all the electronics, so you can use any language you like from any machine!

SHIPPINGWe are planning to ship from two warehouses. One based in the EU/UK and one in the US. This means if you are in the UK, EU or the US you won't have to pay any customs or duties. If you are outside these areas you may owe duty and taxes based on your local regulations.  PLUG & PLAY ELECTRONICS Our journey began with creating plug-and-play electronics modules. We felt creating your own electronics projects was too frustrating. From cryptic datasheets, and fragile bread-boarding, to fruitless searching for drivers on the internet. So we created a system of electronic modules that could be just plugged together, starting with modules for LEDs, buttons, screens and a range of sensors. We then thought: why not put it all together in a nice case? And so the LumiCube was born. The perfect platform for loads of interesting projects.For us, the LumiCube is just the beginning. We hope to soon start selling the modules separately so that other people can just as easily create their own electronics projects. Want to add servo motors to your project? Just plug in the servo module. Want to detect distances? Plug in the distance sensor.   OUR MISSION We are two friends on a mission to bring the joy of tinkering with technology to as wide an audience as possible. We are developing an environment where anyone can create their own electronics and it's super simple to program. A system that is simple enough for teenagers to create the robots they always imagined, but advanced enough for researchers to use to automate lab work. Pros at work!",25.0,1,"1 Campaign
